description1: The website was created using the Next.js framework, because I wanted to apply the acquired knowledge in practice.
list_item1: I had to get used to the new Next.js framework-specific way of assigning classes to elements, working with class modules and figuring out how to assign more than one class to an element.
list_item2: Multilingual website programming with next-i18next. The documentation only provided how to translate page components, so I had to find a way to translate normal components as well.
title: CV website
